data.title: Get to Know NDBT's CEO Larry Miller
data.meta_description: Meet NDBT's President & Chief Executive Officer, Larry Miller. Larry is Chairman of NDBT's Board of Directors, chief visionary and senior strategic officer.
data.meta_site_name: NDBT - Dallas Banking & Loans | NDBT.com - Visit and learn more about NDBT with 5 locations across North DFW. NDBT offers customers Authentic Intelligence in our online accounts & services - a blend of wisdom, ingenuity, care & action in our banking & financial services that achieve a level of trust that automated algorithms could never match.
data.text:
Larry Miller is President & Chief Executive Officer for NDBT and serves as Chairman of the Board of Directors. As the chief visionary and senior strategic officer for NDBT, Larry focuses on ensuring the sustainability of the enterprise, the preservation of the bank’s unique culture and the preparation of the next generation of NDBT Bankers.

Larry has spent his entire banking career with NDBT, beginning with his first job as North Dallas Bank & Trust’s mail services representative in 1982. His journey from the mailroom to the boardroom has included a variety of positions within the bank including Mail & Research Clerk, Collections Manager, Credit Analyst, Credit Manager, Loan Officer, Banking Center President and, ultimately, President & CEO.

Larry earned his Bachelor of Business Administration degree from Abilene Christian University. He is a member of the Texas Bankers Association Board of Directors and is currently Vice Chairman of the Advisory Board and a member of the Executive Committee for the Commercial Banking Program at Texas A&M University.
